meanings.definition: Being endless or having no apparent end
meanings.sent1: The desert seemed to stretch on with interminablenesses dunes.
meanings.sent2: The journey through the maze felt like an interminablenesses adventure.
meanings.sent3: The line at the amusement park was interminablenesses, but we finally reached the roller coaster.
meanings.sent4: Her patience was like interminablenesses, never running out even in the toughest times.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range appeared interminablenesses, its peaks disappearing into the clouds.

meanings.sent1: The interminablenesses of the ocean filled him with awe.
